REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT

Title: Requires the wearing of flotation devices when underway on pleasure vessels less than twenty-one feet
Summary: Requires the wearing of flotation devices when underway on pleasure vessels less than twenty-one feet.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the navigation law, in relation to the wearing of personal flotation devices when underway on pleasure vessels less than twenty-one feet
